job.title: Software Engineer - New Grad (Summer 2022)
job.description: Every day tens of millions of people from around the world come to Roblox to play learn work and socialize in immersive digital experiences created by the communityltbrgtltbrgtOur vision is to build a platform that enables shared experiences among billions of users This is whats known as the metaverse a persistent space where anyone can do just about anything they can imagine from anywhere in the world and on any device The breadth of opportunities and the evolving demands of this firstofitskind platform ensure that your avenues for growth are always expanding and flexibleltbrgtltbrgtJoin us and youll usher in a new category of human interaction while solving exceptional challenges that you wont find anywhere elseltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtSoftware Engineer  New Grad Summer 2022ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe engineers at Roblox are working on the hardest problems in tech today  distributed systems real time communication 3D coexperience massive data processing social networking rendering physics and more As a ltstronggtSoftware Engineerltstronggt you will have real ownership and impact across one or more of these domainsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtYou
